name: Denial of license
text: [§412:13-204]  Denial of license.  If the commissioner is not satisfied that the foreign bank meets all the criteria set forth for approval, the commissioner shall issue a written decision denying the application.  A foreign bank which is denied approval may request a hearing before the commissioner in accordance with chapter 91.  Any final decision of the commissioner denying a foreign bank a license may be appealed to the circuit court as provided in chapter 91. [L 1996, c 155, pt of §2]
